doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 43 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 10/20/1986] [3]--GCN/CB No. 39
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 43 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 10/20/1986] [3]--GCN/CB No. 39

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Jerry Falwell loses $5000 for on-air anti-gay comments2. Chicago, mayor's endorsement of gay civil rights bill despite its defeat, and stamping of US currency with "gay dollar"COMMERCIAL: Gay Cable Network fundraiser3. Interview with Michael Hardwick and Sue Lebo, a member of the Lesbian Rights Project, regarding the next step in combating decision in Georgia sodomy case, Bowers v HardwickCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine4. Alexandria, Virginia gay community sponsors advertizing campaign to promote acceptance of homosexuals5. Andy Humm on the death of Diego Lopez, director of the Gay Men's Health Crisis, and the need for more activism and involvement in the communityCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp6. San Francisco mayor Diane Feinstein states city's gay pride parade promotes rampant and un-safe promiscuity7. Dallas Gay Alliance places billboards in low-income and ethnic areas to help educate minorities about AIDS8. Authorities urging all those who are high risk for infection to take the HTLVIII antibody test9. Washington State Insurance Commission holds last public hearing on insurance companies using HTLVIII antibody testing and lifestyle questions to deny coverageCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation with Jose Sarria10. Sports Report11. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, clips from "Betty Blue"2. Clips for ABC's coverage of Lyndon LaRouche and California AIDS quarantine bill3. Attempt to turn Rhyolite, Nevada into the first town for gays4. Another clip from "Betty Blue"COMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazineCOMMERCIAL: GCN's "SUDS" gay soap opera looking for locations5. Conclusion of interview with director Derek JarmanCOMMERCIAL: Gay Cable Network fundraiser6. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 43 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 10/20/1986] [3]--GCN/CB No. 39: October 1986
